TopicTitle: Since when do multiple engines gimbal to create roll?!?

Articles.Content:
I was launching a career Duna science harvester when I realized that the capsule alone on the launcher could not possibly roll the entire craft like it was. I had no RCS or Reaction Wheels (Which came to haunt me when the Gyro Kraken decided to focus it's powers on the craft for the ENTIRE MISSION ). I snapped this screenshot:

Kind of hard to see, but the engines are gimballing to roll the craft. I've never noticed this before.

When was this added?

Edited September 22, 2014 by Starwhip
Interesting. This should help greatly with my lifter designing.

The LFB is the 2 engined one. The 4 engined S3 KS-25x4 Engine Cluster can control roll, but the LFB KR-1x2 can't. the uncertainty is why Squad chose not to give it the option when they did the other multi nozzeled gimballed engines.
